column4: excuse me, I have downloaded a .sh file (HON client installer for linux) to my downloads folder,, i double clicked it but it says i need to choose an application to run (WTF) lol, how can i make install this on my rig?
wait.. im opening now a terminal
sorry kitche2 but should i just type that?
am i doing this right?? i typed " chmod +x '/home/jhoc2x2/Downloads/HoNClient-0.3.1.sh' "
chmod won't say anything when it runs
there's no output from the shell file?
do you know what the file is supposed to do?
it's supposed to do an installation of my favourite game Heroes of Newerth
do you know where it is supposed to install to?
sorry, i can't help you much further, can't really diagnose anything from here
